text: Kukwakwepe (Allah) ni kwaukuwuchisyidwa umanyilisi wa Kiyama. Soni isogosi ngaikasakopoka mu itungatunga mwakwe, ni ngachikasajigala chiilu chachikongwe chilichose kapena kuŵeleka, ikaŵeje kwa umanyilisi Wakwe (Allah), sano lisiku lyataakaaŵilanje ŵanganyao (Allah ni kwawusya kuti): “Ali kwapi ŵamwamwanganyaga nao ŵala?” Ŵanganyao takajile: “Tukummanyisya yanti pangali jwalijose mwetuwe jwaakuŵichila umboni (wanti Mmwe nkwete ŵakum’bwanganya nao).”
